Un juego que para ser bueno es demasiado dificil, tienes que tener mucha dedicacion y paciencia, lo malo es que que muchos jugadores son demasiado toxicos, y si es tu primera vez jugando csgo ten por seguro que te van a sacar de mas de una partida
dejad de usar chetos para este juego lo estais matando :)
this game is just farking alot hacker and valve not doing anything not a good suggestion to play this game anymore

Great game, its a gem. A lot of people have quit nowadays thought because hacking is rampant, they haven't updated their anti cheat, the ranked system needs completely revamped; it's so bad like 80% of the ranked community is one tier and your elo isn't shown and its all about win streaks. It needs updated because right now it seems as if Valve is just milking money out of this game till it slowly dies, most good players use third party matchmaking. 

That being said, you will still get hundreds if not thousands of hours out of this game before you decide its garbage due to lack of updates and gaben needs to leave so a new CS will be funded because 2011 was 9 years ago.

Забанили за скин-чейнджер. Обидно как-то что людей банят не за читы а за текстурки которые все равно ни кто кроме тебя не видет. Игра хорошая в плане командной работы и баланса, но фиговый анти-чит и иногда твои попадания не регистрируются. После того как игра стала бесплатной можно играть только на прайме, без него игра превращается в dark souls.
Muy entretenido a la hora de jugar con amigos, pero en cuanto a jugar solo es lo mas toxico que existe. No importa la nacionalidad, esta lleno de toxicos. Pero fuera de eso es divertido.
